content: Randaam shushroosha
Praarththhana

Maranamullllavare paapamaranatthilninnu rakshikkaanvendi shareeraprakaaram maranamanubhavicha utthamanum maranamillaatthavanumaaya daivame! Ninte karunayude prathyaashayil nashvaramaaya ee lokatthilninnu yaathrayaayirikkunna ee nyangallude sahodaranuvendi nyangall ninnodapekshikkunnu. Ivanu aathmeeyamaaya poornnaashvaasam nalkukayum ninte raajyatthile virunnil thozhanmaarodukoode ivane irutthukayum cheyyaname. Jeevanullllavanum jeevan nalkunnavanumaaya pithyaputhraparishuddhaathmaavaaya ekadaivame! Nee utthamanum manushyasnehamullllavanumaakunnuvallo. Ninakku ennanneykkum bahumaanam yogyamaakunnu.
Laolam olmeen aammeen
(kukkiliyon)

Vaazhtthuka naathhane ennaathmaave!-haale...
Thirunaamatthe ennasthhikalle!

Vaazhtthuka naathhane ennaathmaave!-haale...
Orkkuka thalprathidaanangall.

Mochicheedum nin paapangall-haale....
Vedanakallkkekum shamanam.

Naashamozhichavanam cheyyum-haale...
Kaarunyatthaal thaangum ninne.
Baarekmor, shubaho ... Menaolam…
(ekkbo-haudatthu in)

Snaane ninneyaninyore
Mudivinu naathhaa!-vediyaruthe
Nintirumeyu bhakshichore
Dahanan bhakshicheedaruthe
/tninne-vaazhtthiya vadanangall
/tvilapi-kkaruthe vedanayaal
Mrthare sandarshicha suthaa
Krpayadiyaaril che-yyenam.
Saumenkaalosu

items.content: Marichavare punaruththhaanam cheyyikkunnavanum kabaradakkappettavare ezhunnelppikkunnavanum jeevanullllavarudeyum marichavarudeyum nyaayaadhipanum sakala aathmaakkalludeyum jadangalludeyum daivavum marippikkukayum jeevippikkukayum paathaallatthilekku irakkukayum avideninnu kayattukayum cheyyunnavanum manushyante aayushkkaalatthinu parimithi nirnnayikkukayum maranam mukhena athine azhichu maayichukallayukayum akshayavum anashvaravumaaya jeevithatthinaayi villichezhunnelppikkukayum cheyyunnavanumaaya kartthaavinu sthuthi. Thante daasante shavasamskkaara shushroosha nirvahikkappedunna ee samayatthum..... Utthamanaaya thanne naam ortthu mahathvappedutthanam. Bkoolhoon......

Balavaanaaya daivamaaya kartthaave! Mahaneeyamaaya ninte prathyakshathayude aa avasaana divasatthil parethar naasharahitharaayi uththhaanam cheyyukayum sakala paretharudeyum asthhikall shekharikkappedukayum sooryachandranmaar irundupovukayum nakshathrangall prakaasharahithamaayittheerukayum bhayangkara kaahallangall dhvanikkukayum shushrooshakanmaaraaya maalaakhamaar bhayatthode nilkkukayum bhayangkarangallaaya pusthakangall thurakkappettu sakalarudeyum pravrtthikall parishodhikkappedukayum jnyaanikall maunamaayum samarththhanmaar vismayichum nilkkukayum neethimaanmaar manavarayil santoshikkukayum dushkkarmmikall agnikku bhakshanamaayi nalkappedukayum punyavaanmaar prakaashatthil aanandikkukayum dushdanmaar puratthe andhakaaratthilekku ayaykkappedukayum vishuddhanmaar santoshikkukayum shreshdhanmaar aahlaadikkukayum paapikall aazhameriya kuzhiyilekku vidhikkappedukayum valatthubhaagam jayatthaal shreshdhathappedukayum idatthubhaagam nithyadandanatthilekku thallllappedukayum irubhaagangallum avaravar arhikkunnathu praapikkukayum avaykku maattam sambhavikkaathirikkukayum cheyyunnathaaya aa samayatth, kartthaave! Ninte roopatthilum chhaayayilum srshdikkappettavanaaya ee daasanil ninakku anukampa thonnaname. Ninte vishuddha kaikallaal nirmmikkappettu alangkarikkappettathaaya ee vaathsalyasrshdiyil ninakku sahathaapam thonnaname. Ninne sthuthikkuvaanaayi nirmmikkappetta ee patthu kampiyulllla kinnaratthekkurichu ninakku anukampa thonnaname, maranam nashippikkukayum chithalinum puzhuvinum koodaayittheerukayum cheyyunna ee maanushika janalukallekkurichum kottakallekkurichum ninakku anukampa thonnaname poozhiyaayittheerunna ee sundaramaaya aakaaratthekkurichu ninakku kanivundaakaname maamoodeesaayude rooshmaayaal mudrayidappettavanum jeevanulllla ninte shareerarakthangall anubhavichittullllavanum ninnilulllla vishvaasatthil thante jeevitham avasaanippichu ninte adukkalekku yaathrayaayirikkunnavanumaaya ee daasanil kanivu thonnaname. Preethiyodukoode ivante aathmaavine kaikkollllukayum dushdaathmaakkallude sthhaanangallilninnu kaatthu ninte maalaakhamaaraakunna senakallude sahaayatthaal ivane samrakshichukollllukayum cheyyaname. Kartthaave! Ninte raajyatthinte maahaathmyatthe thirichariyaathirunnavarodukoode narakashikshaykkaayi ivane vidhikkaruthe. Ninte manushyaavathaaratthe dushichavarodukoode ninnodorumichulllla aanandatthilninnu ivane thallllikkallayaruthe. Manushyapreethiyaal ivanil dayathonni ninte mahaakarunayaal ivane darshikkumaaraakaname! Ninte thirunivaasasthhalatthu ivane etthikkaname. Ninte vishuddhanmaarkkulllla ohariyil ivaneyum ullppedutthaname. Ninte prakaasha manavarayil ivaneyum krameekarikkaname. Jeevakaramaaya punaruththhaanatthinum ninte valatthubhaagatthulllla shreshdhamaaya nilaykkum ivane arhanaakkaname. Ivante kadangallude mochanatthaal ivane aanandippikkukayum pizhakallude kshamayaal santoshippikkukayum cheyyaname. Mahaneeyamaaya ninte thejassaal ivane aanandippikkaname. Ninte valatthubhaagatthulllla theranyedukkappettavarodu koode mahathvatthil ivan shobhikkumaaraakaname. Kartthaave! Kshanikavum apakadapoornnavumaaya ee jeevithatthil avasheshikkunna paapikallum ninte daasarumaaya nyangalle karunaapoorvvakamaaya niryaanatthinum ninte bhavanakkaarkkum vathsalanmaarkkum uchithavum ninakku preethikaravumaaya nalla avasaanatthinum arharaakkaname. Nyangallil oruvaneppolum ninte raajyatthilninnu anyanum verthirikkappettavanumaakkittheerkkaruthe. Snehapoorvvam nee vannu nyangalle rakshichathupole veendum thirikevannu ninakku yogyamaaya nilayil nyangalle orukkikkollllaname. Rakshayum veendeduppum ninakkum ninte pithaavinum parishuddha roohaaykkum ulllla thaakunnu.. .

content: (thakkeppo-manahamono)

Jeevadane! Mrthiyaarnnore
Uththhaanam-cheyyippone
Kshanavum sthothravumattoraam
Mrthigathare-jeevippikka.
Laasarine-kallarayinnum
Aahvaanam-cheythoru naadaal
Vishvaasa-tthodu mrthi poondor-
Kkuththhaanam- nalkeedename.
Moriyo…

items.content: Mahaakaarunyavaanaaya daivamaaya kartthaave! Ninnodu nyangall apekshikkunnu. Marananidra praapichirikkunna ee ninte daasante aathmaavinuvendi ippoll nyangall ninakkanachathaaya ee dhoopam kaikkondu paapaparihaaratthinum mochanatthinum thirusannidhiyilulllla mukhaprasannathaykkum ivane arhanaakkaname. Subtext: Moraanvaalohaan..

content: (kolo-malkkomnahmono)

Kaikko-lllluka naathhaa! Nin daasan than samskaare
Nyangallanacho-ripparimalla dhoopam.
Ithinaa-l nin sharane maranamadanyorkkaashvaasam
Smrthiyodoppam-nee nalkeedaname.

Jeeva-pradaraajan; mahimayil vaanattheennumudi-
Chekum-mrtharaam-akhilarkkum jeevan.
Onnaay-mrtharellaam kabareennuththhitharaay,
Praanan nalkum ninne-sthothram cheytheedum.
Baarekmor. Shubaho …

Engaa-thram bhakshichuyirelum rudhiram paanam
Cheyvone nyaan-vediyaa sheeyollil
Ennaa-lavanennum jeevippaan nyaan mrthanaaye-
Nneeshan chonno-raa vachanam sthuthyam.
Menaolam…

Sneha-tthodetthi; sleebaayaal rakshichavanaa-
Yiniyum vanni-ttaadaamyareyetti
Mahimaam-baramekum; jayaveeran eesho nrpane
Naam sthothram che-ythaaraadhikkenam.
(madarosho-pardaiso)

Navyathayuththhaane-karunaabdhe nalka
Ninnil nidritharaam-nin daasanmaarkkaay.

Sodarare! Kaanmin kabarin-samhaaram
Marthyaakaaratthe-mrthyu hanikkunnu.
Aadaamin kshayamor-tthee mrthiyil kezhin
/tmrthalokatthil podiyaamee ulakatthin
Mohatthe viduvin-karunaapoornnaa! Nin
Srshdikkekaname-puthuma uyirppingkal.

Mrtharude homonil-vanneri kaanmin
Mrthi koompaaram pol-koottiya maanavar than
Durbhagagaathrangall-paazhmanpaathrangall
/tbheekaramasthhikallil krmikall kudikollvoo
Ithu kandaal thaazhtthum-thala garvishdhanmaar
Nashvaralokatthe-snehippor vaadum.

Priyare! Sundarare!-paathaallam pookin
Sangkadaramgatthil-mlechchhathaye kaanmin.
Azhakellaam poyi-chamayangall paazhaayu
/tmodam nalkum parimallamillavidengum
Aareyumodikkum-durgandham paaram
Chaarchakkaaraneyum-neriduvaan vayyaa.

Nin sharane mrtharaam-janaka bhraathaakkall
Saubhaagyasthhaana-tthelkkanamaashvaasam
Vamshavidhikkaayu nee-aagathanaakum naall
/tunnathamaam yerushalemil ninnadiyaar
Modaagaaratthil-vimalanmaaroppam
Sthuthi nithyam paadaan-bhaagyam nedenam.

Svargapathe! Mrthare jeevippikkaname
Nin sharane jeevan-viramippichoraam
Sakala paretharkkum-mochanamekaname.
/tninnude vandinamathilavar -modikkaname.
Avarazhalillaathe-thejodhaarikallaayu
Manavaraye modaal-praapicheedenam.

Sthuthi kaarunyatthaal srshdichon janakaa
Sthothram sleebaayaal-rakshichon thanayaa!
Sthothram praanadanaam-parishuddhaathmaave!
/tnyangallileppozhum mashihaa rakshakane!
Kanivundaakaname-adiyaarum mrtharum
Ninne ennennum-sthothram cheytheedum.
(sugeeso-eskaanaashu aahaay)

Sodarare!-koodin enneyo-rttheeduvin
Ningade-samsargam vittene-nneykkum.

Yaathra purappetten, bhojyameni-kkilla
Enne kai-kkollvaan priyare! Praarththhippin.

Nee krpayaa-lenne mannaal sr-shdichu
Paathaki nyaan-pookeedaruthe paa-thaallam.

Paathaki nyaa-n-enne nyaan nindi-kkunnu
Ampudayo-ne ninnamparththhi-kkunnen.

Srshdipathe! Srshdichenne nin-vadivil
Veezharuthe-narakattheeyil nyaa-n naathhaa!

Angeraa-nelluthallengkil thr-kkanivaal
Nyaan meva-ttaapatthenye vaa-thilkkal.

Arayil ke-tteedum sleebaayaam-vaallaal
Aapalsthhaa-natthe nee tharanam-cheyyum.

Eeshan jee-vamayan kabareennum-ninne
Edanilekkettum jeevan nee-nedum

Svarbhaagyam-pookum shuddhanmaa-roppam
Neeyaamo-dikkum khedam nee-ngeedum.

Rakshakanaa-meesho! Jeevadane! Enne
Jeevippi-kkuka nin krpaye nyaa-n vaazhtthum.
Moriyo ...
(maar apreminte bovooso)

Aardrathayaal naathhaa! Devaa!
Daasannekaname punyam
Nin mahimodayanaall thannil
Nirtthaname valamaayivane.

Vathsalare paathaallatthin
Vazhiyum paarppidavum paartthaan
Ningalle verpiriyaanenne
Ippollaahvaanam cheythu.

Pinnaale vannon doothan
Veenaanen meethe vegam
Nyaanariyaathenne nere
Koottikkondayyo poyaan.

Baandhavare kaanaanalppam
Nilkkanamennabhyarththhichen
Kettillen vaakyam doothan
Vaangichillan kaikkooli.

Srashdaavaam thaathan sthuthyan
Rakshakanaam puthran vandyan
Kabareennum parudeesaayil
Cherkkum roohaa sthothraarhan.

Aardrathayaal naathhaa! Devaa!
Daasannekaname punyam nin
Mahimodayanaall thannil
Nirtthaname valamaayivane.
